update.description:
This brings the port of boost filesystem @clalancette added to sdformat into ignition common.

There were some equivalent functions in both: `exists`, `isDirectory`, `append/joinPaths`. The ones already in `ignition-common` were kept and the ones from the port were removed. All filesystem function declarations in `Util.hh` were moved to `Filesystem.hh`, and an include of `Filesystem.hh` was added to `Util.hh` so existing code doesn't break.

The BOOST licensed implementations are in `Filesystem.cc`, and the Apache 2.0 licensed implementations are in `FilesystemOSRF.cc`. I moved filesystem function implementations from `Util.cc` into `FilesystemOSRF.cc`.  Filesystem tests were moved from `Util_TEST.cc` to `Filesystem_TEST.cc`.

Some function names in the port were changed to match the style guide, but anything within `Filesystem.cc` was left alone.
update.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common

pull_request.title: Port SDF Filesystem to Ignition Common
